description: There is a given sequence of integers $ a_{1},a_{2},...,a_{n} $ , where every number is from 1 to 3 inclusively. You have to replace the minimum number of numbers in it so that all the numbers in the sequence are equal to each other.
inputFormat: The first line contains an integer $ n $ ( $ 1<=n<=10^{6} $ ). The second line contains a sequence of integers $ a_{1},a_{2},...,a_{n} $ ( $ 1<=a_{i}<=3 $ ).
outputFormat: Print the minimum number of replacements needed to be performed to make all the numbers in the sequence equal.
hint: In the example all the numbers equal to 1 and 3 should be replaced by 2.
translation: 有一个给定整数序列 $a_1,a_2,\dots\dots,a_n$ 序列中每一个元素都是从 $1-3$ 中的任意一个。您必须从其中替换尽可能少的元素，以使序列中的所有数字都相等。
